markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tactical Entry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1800) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Requirements**
You rolled [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative in this encounter, and neither you nor any enemies have acted yet in this encounter.

</column>

---

You Stride. This movement doesn't trigger any reactions.
name: Tactical Entry
requirement: You rolled  Stealth  for initiative in this encounter, and neither you nor any enemies have acted yet in this encounter.
